mapper.select: select dctj.* from devops_ci_template_stage_job_rel dctsjr join devops_ci_template_job dctj on dctj.id = dctsjr.ci_template_job_id where dctsjr.ci_template_stage_id = #{stageId} AND dctj.visibility=1

select * from devops_ci_template_job dctj where dctj.group_id = #{groupId} and ((dctj.source_type = 'site' and dctj.source_id = 0) or (dctj.source_type = 'organization' and dctj.source_id = #{organizationId}) or (dctj.source_type = 'project' and dctj.source_id = #{projectId}) ) AND dctj.visibility=1
